Rulings.Edison:
●You can discard Thunder Dragon to activate its effect even if it would not go to your GY. For example, when Banisher of the Light is face-up on the field.
●If you have your opponent's Thunder Dragon in your hand because of Exchange, you can discard it to activate its effect and search your Deck for up to 2 Thunder Dragons.
●You can't discard Thunder Dragon to activate its effect if you don't have any Thunder Dragon in your Deck.
Rulings.Tengu:
●You can discard Thunder Dragon to activate its effect even if it would not go to your GY. For example, when Banisher of the Light is face-up on the field.
●If you have your opponent's Thunder Dragon in your hand because of Exchange, you can discard it to activate its effect and search your Deck for up to 2 Thunder Dragons.
●You cannot discard Thunder Dragon to activate its effect if you do not have any Thunder Dragon in your Deck.
Rulings.Goat:
●You can discard Thunder Dragon to activate its effect even if it would not go to your GY. For example, when Banisher of the Light is face-up on the field.
●If you have your opponent's Thunder Dragon in your hand because of Exchange, you can discard it to activate its effect and search your Deck for up to 2 Thunder Dragons.
●You can discard Thunder Dragon to activate its effect even if you have 2 Thunder Dragon already in your GY.“Thunder Dragon’s” effect is an activated effect. 
●“Thunder Dragon” may be discarded to search for 0 “Thunder Dragons” in the player’s deck.
●The effect of “Thunder Dragon” may not be activated if it is discarded through another effect.

Rulings.Base: 1. You can discard "Thunder Dragon" to activate its effect even if it would not go to your GY. For example, when "Banisher of the Light" is face-up on the field.\n2. If you have your opponent's "Thunder Dragon" in your hand because of "Exchange", you can discard it to activate its effect and search your Deck for up to 2 copies of "Thunder Dragon".\n3. You cannot discard "Thunder Dragon" to activate its effect if you do not have any "Thunder Dragon" in your Deck.
